text.fd_cookbook.cook_book.landing_text: This Book Will hopefully Explain everything you should know about FarmersDelight, if you have further questions please visit the $(l:https://discord.gg/eFsz5SK)Discord Server$(). If you find any Typos/bad grammar please comment on the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/farmers-delight-cookbook-addon)modpage$()
